context: The word 'laaja' is an adjective that means wide, broad or vast. It can also refer to something being extensive or comprehensive in scope. The word declines based on case and number; the provided dictionary definitions show all possible forms. For example, 'laajan' is the genitive singular form meaning 'of a wide [something]', while 'laajat' is the nominative plural form meaning 'wide [things]'. The suffix '-ssa/-ssä' indicates location ('in/at'), so 'laajassa talossa' means 'in a wide house'.
